verses.roman:
govinda kahe,--'uṭha āsi' karaha bhojana'
haridāsa kahe,--āji karimu laṅghana

synonyms: govinda kahe—Govinda said; uṭha—please get up; āsi'-coming; karaha bhojana—take your prasāda; haridāsa kahe—Haridāsa replied; āji—today; karimu laṅghana—I shall observe fasting.
translation: "Please rise and take your mahā-prasāda," Govinda said. Haridāsa Ṭhākura replied, "Today I shall observe fasting.
